title: A Wizard's Tale
synopsis: When a grumpy and gruff wizard casts a spell to end all happiness, a reluctant teen and a princess must save the magical realm from a lifetime of gloom.
imdbplot: In the wake of civil unrest sweeping the country, African American teens Virgil and Remmy decide it's time to turn the tables on a prominent member of their community - a KKK Grand Wizard. Caught between their friendship and burning desire for justice is Billy, a 12-year-old Caucasian boy with a limited understanding about the nature of hate and violence.
